text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
Station KU01VI
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis 14, Minnesota
February 27, 1958
Mr. Frank E. Schooley
Station WILL
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
I've been looking over your memos to the
Publications and Membership Committees. In regard
to the latter, I hear via the grapevine that Keith
Tyler is still unhappy over the dissolution of AERT.
I also recall a third or fourth hand report to the
effect that he thinks that we aren't doing what we
should for individual members. Perhaps you may
have some reactionsl
As the other communications you have or will
be receiving from me indicate, we have been putting
a lot of work in on foundations, Washington planning,
and station activation assignments.
With best personal regards,
Yours sincerely
,0
Burton Paulu
President
BP:ds
